full_text: Page 2240 Fwd: Re: Interviews From [b)(6); (b)(7)(C) To [redacted] Date 2019/08/20 15:22 Subject: Fwd: Re: Interviews Attachments: TEXT.htm I called and Left a Voice mail, there was no answer Respectfully, [b)(6); (b)(7)(C) Clinical Nurse Specialist Department Of Justice Bureau Of Prisons MCC New York 150 Park Row New York, NY 10007 [b)(6); (b)(7)(C) @BOP.GOV >> [b)(6); (b)(7)(C) 8/16/2019 1:43 PM >>> Good afternoon, Per the below, OIG would like to interview you regarding the incident last weekend involving EPSTEIN, Jeffrey, reg. no. 76318-054. Please call Special Agent [b)(6); (b)(7)(C) at 202-853-[b)(6); (b)(7)(C) at your convenience. Thank you, [b)(6); (b)(7)(C) [b)(6); (b)(7)(C) Supervisory Staff Attorney CLC New York Metropolitan Correctional Center 150 Park Row New York, New York 10007 p: (646)836-[b)(6); (b)(7)(C) f: (646)836-7665 >>> [b)(6); (b)(7)(C) /16/2019 1:41 PM >>> Per the attached OIG would like to interview the following staff members. >>> [b)(6); (b)(7)(C) (OIG) [b)(6); (b)(7)(C) usdoj.gov> 8/16/2019 12:56 PM >>> Sent from mobile device, please excuse typos. [b)(6); (b)(7)(C) Page 12712 DOJ-OGR-00026013

text_blocks.content: From [b)(6); (b)(7)(C) To [redacted] Date 2019/08/20 15:22 Subject: Fwd: Re: Interviews Attachments: TEXT.htm
I called and Left a Voice mail, there was no answer
Respectfully, [b)(6); (b)(7)(C) Clinical Nurse Specialist Department Of Justice Bureau Of Prisons MCC New York 150 Park Row New York, NY 10007 [b)(6); (b)(7)(C) @BOP.GOV

>> [b)(6); (b)(7)(C) 8/16/2019 1:43 PM >>> Good afternoon, Per the below, OIG would like to interview you regarding the incident last weekend involving EPSTEIN, Jeffrey, reg. no. 76318-054. Please call Special Agent [b)(6); (b)(7)(C) at 202-853-[b)(6); (b)(7)(C) at your convenience.

Thank you, [b)(6); (b)(7)(C) [b)(6); (b)(7)(C) Supervisory Staff Attorney CLC New York Metropolitan Correctional Center 150 Park Row New York, New York 10007 p: (646)836-[b)(6); (b)(7)(C) f: (646)836-7665
>>> [b)(6); (b)(7)(C) /16/2019 1:41 PM >>> Per the attached OIG would like to interview the following staff members.
Sent from mobile device, please excuse typos.

additional_notes: The document is an email chain discussing an interview request by the OIG regarding an incident involving Jeffrey Epstein. Multiple names and contact information are redacted.
